22.01.2012 SH SCR17880 Step1,2/5 Fixed error SQL0338 “JOIN predicate not valid”

to credman instead of creation a dunning letter via BID019

25.06.2004 JJ SCR6436 turn job to MSGW if CALD not found
13.05.2004 JJ SCR6106 cont. changed upper limit dun date to gnrl dpd + 31
11.05.2004 JJ SCR6106 cont. added new upperlimit dun date sched to step 5
27.04.2004 JJ SCR6106 changed check step 5 to check vs duedate

27.01.2004 JJ SCR5379 test version with new test
04.11.2003 JJ SCR4688 added exception joins on MC's with MARK_DUNNINGPRINTINV =N
15.10.2003 SH SCR4559 Removed part 6 "Reschedule risk analysis" from BID007, now
- implemented in BID019_D2
15.10.2003 JJ SCR4398 cont. fixed bugs in date handling via MULT_NUMERIC2
23.09.2003 JJ SCR4398 major revision, 2 stage process
-1st writes DEBC/INVO_NO/IDUN_DUNDATESCHED to MULT (1 transaction)
-2nd Reselects all IDUN rows with the INVO_NO/datesched (transcation/DEBC)
- removed all indexes from links to avoid ORDER BY in SQL clause which might
confuse the optimizer.
- changed all subtasks to be resident ...
07.01.2003 JJ opened DEBC in write mode in task "select inv.." for transaction
06.01.2003 JJ SCR2740 changed condition call "RescheduleLawyerIncasso"
18.12.2002 JJ SCR2709 added check on CALD_DUNNINGDAYFROM/UNTIL
10.12.2002 JJ -Moved calls from RS "select inv.." to GS (still record level)

03.12.2002 JJ req JDO implementation BID019/020
-replaced task calculating open amounts per debtor by handling via OID020
-replaced call BIUD008 by call BID019
-Changed mode task Select INVO to Query

-LETTERCODLAWYERINCAS hard coded to '099'

- > GNRL_NDAYSDUNNINGBYMAIL

so the link was never executed.
-included invo_dunningstop = 'N' in checksum aactuali
26.07.2002 JJ SCR1530 changed task mode select invoice to modify

"normal" magic with link joine and DB where clause

-dropped task to update IDUN (update in select task)

04.06.2002 JJ added quotes around dates in variable where clauses 4 sum AACTUALC

24.04.2002 SH Changed result database from FACTORLINK to MEMORY in task
- 'Update INVOICE_DUNNING rows'
18.04.2002 JJ SCR1139 Added sending of letters only if INVO_NO/DUEDATE same as
first in DEBC group.
- changed character set of SQL vars in task select INV... from OEM to ANSI
- changed storage type of INVO_DEBC_NO to packed decimal
variable where clauses duedate vs dayprograms date
Clear out MULT if anything left from pevious runs

SQL_STMT_U.val: Select INVO_DEBC_NO, IDUN_NO, MIN(IDUN_DUNNDATESCHED), MAX(INVO_DUEDATE), cast(days(MIN(IDUN_DUNNDATESCHED)) - days(MAX(INVO_DUEDATE)) as decimal (9,0)) from :1/IDUN cross join :1/DULD cross join :1/INVO exception join :1/MARK S on S.MARK_CODE = INVO_MARKCODESPEC and S.MARK_DUNNINGPRINTINV = 'N' exception join :1/MARK T on T.MARK_CODE = INVO_MARKCODETEXT and T.MARK_DUNNINGPRINTINV = 'N' where (IDUN_CONTINUOUS = 'Y' or IDUN_CYCLEDAYS >= :2 and IDUN_CYCLEDAYS <= :3) and IDUN_DUNNDATESCHED <= ':4' and IDUN_DUNNDATEEFFECTIVE is null and IDUN_DUNNLETTER <> ':5' and DULD_PRINTINVOICES <> 4 and DULD_LETTER = IDUN_DUNNLETTER and INVO_NO = IDUN_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 Group by INVO_DEBC_NO, IDUN_NO order by 1,5 desc ,4,2

Text.val: Only write the first INVO per DEBC in selection to MULT
The next stage reselects all IDUN rows with this INVO_NO/IDUN_DUNNDATESCHED
Mult numeric 2 = date in format YYYMMDD
Mult numeric 3 difference dunndatesched - due datal
Link for log test version
-- 6. Special credman tests (only if GSET_YESNO = Y (GSET_ID = 122))
-- First check if there is already an (unhandled) row in CRDB where CRDB_DEBC_NO = INVO_DEBC_NO and CRDB_CATEGORY in (6,7,8,17)
-- If YES then skip step 9
Check results. 0 = not checked, 1 = send letter, 2 = don't sent letter
6. Special credman tests
9. Prepare the sending of dunning letters
... if not to be handled by credman create the dunning letter
If relevant sum not checked, do so now
If relevant sum requires letter, send it
-- Condition is new since SCR2509 13.11.2002 SH
--18.11.2002 JJ moved conditiomn to block around RS
--23.09.2003 JJ condition part of 1st seelection
5. Prepare sending of dunning letters
6. Reschedule lawyer incasso
10.12.2002 Calls 5/6 moved from RS to GS
-- If BID708 was called or BID700.PO.ACTION=2 or DEBB_ACTINVAH<V.MINIMUMAMOUNT or DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTPOSSIBLE = Y then skip step 9
recalculate ATT_CURR => ACC_CURR only if different

SQL_STMT_U.val: select IDUN_NO, MIN(IDUN_DUNNDATESCHED), MAX(INVO_DUEDATE), cast(days(MIN(IDUN_DUNNDATESCHED)) - days(MAX(INVO_DUEDATE)) as decimal (9,0)) from :1/IDUN cross join :1/INVO exception join :1/MARK S on S.MARK_CODE = INVO_MARKCODESPEC and S.MARK_DUNNINGPRINTINV = 'N' exception join :1/MARK T on T.MARK_CODE = INVO_MARKCODETEXT and T.MARK_DUNNINGPRINTINV = 'N' where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_NO <> :3 and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and IDUN_DUNNDATEEFFECTIVE is null and INVO_NO = IDUN_NO and INVO_DUEDATE <= ':4' and IDUN_DUNNDATESCHED <= ':6' and INVO_DUNNINGSTOP ='N' Group by IDUN_NO having days(MIN(IDUN_DUNNDATESCHED)) - days(MAX(INVO_DUEDATE)) > :5 order by 2, 1

Text.val: Invoice link for log only

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/CRDB where exists(select * from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = CRDB_DEBC_NO and INVO_NO = :2) and CRDB_CATEGORY in (6,7,8,17)
